TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PngLayer extends Microsoft.Azure.Management.Media.Models.Layer

Docs.summary: Describes the settings to produce a PNG image from the input video.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PngLayer class.

MemberSignature.Value: public PngLayer (string width = default, string height = default, string label = default);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string width, string height, string label) cil managed
Public Sub New (Optional width As String = Nothing, Optional height As String = Nothing, Optional label As String = Nothing)

Docs.param: The width of the output video for this layer. The value can be absolute (in pixels) or relative (in percentage). For example 50% means the output video has half as many pixels in width as the input.

The height of the output video for this layer. The value can be absolute (in pixels) or relative (in percentage). For example 50% means the output video has half as many pixels in height as the input.
The alphanumeric label for this layer, which can be used in multiplexing different video and audio layers, or in naming the output file.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PngLayer class.
